text: Samuel Pisar (March 18, 1929 â€“ July 27, 2015) was a Polish-born American lawyer, author, and Holocaust survivor. He used to work at the United Nations. He is considered one of the most influential trade lawyers of our time. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Polish writers Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:Holocaust survivors
